subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: OT ? RE:  Broken Cellphone
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1199151347
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The reason I ask is because the flip phones have a very thin ribbon cable  
that runs from the top to the bottom of the phone.  The out leads are where  the 
battery lines run and from opening and closing it the leads where out and  
the battery life deteriorates.  I know this from  experience.    But it was just 
a thought.
 
Jeff
